author: Ryan Pickrell
title: US and Chinese government spokeswomen are battling it out in an online war of words over the coronavirus
description: The US and China are locked in a war of words over the coronavirus, with the US sharply criticizing China for covering it up as China celebrates its response and attempts to shift blame. Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs spokeswoman Hua Chunying and US Depa…
content:
Two spokeswomen for the US and Chinese governments are battling it out in an increasingly tense war of words online over China's response to the coronavirus.
The US has accused China of covering up a public health crisis and costing the world valuable time t… [+3379 chars]
